comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: Here's a great pic of the Colonial Mutual building (Cnr Martin Place & Pitt St) during construction in 1894...the keystone setting ceremony - nla.gov.au/nla.news-page5240734 ; I assume they didn't throw a party for every brick put in place...just love these pis of 19th century building works...
